content.raw:
This branch has a [failing test](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64/38/testReport/(root)/Results/test_ran/):

~~~
45: [ RUN      ] Vector3StatsTest.Vector3Stats
45: Unable to InsertStatistic [maxAbs] since it has already been inserted.
45: Unable to InsertStatistic [maxAbs] since it has already been inserted.
45: Unable to InsertStatistic [maxAbs] since it has already been inserted.
45: Unable to InsertStatistic [maxAbs] since it has already been inserted.
45: Unable to InsertStatistic [maxAbs] since it has already been inserted.
45: Unable to InsertStatistic [maxAbs] since it has already been inserted.
45: Unable to InsertStatistic [maxAbs] since it has already been inserted.
45: Unable to InsertStatistic [maxAbs] since it has already been inserted.
45/48 Test #45: UNIT_Vector3Stats_TEST ...........***Exception: SegFault  0.24 sec
~~~

I'm guessing this is related to the changes to SignalStats.cc. Also, I think this is related to #38. @traversaro do you have an idea for the right way to fix this?
